spell.name: Daasis's roll of madness
entries: You unleash a torrent of conflicting thoughts and ideas in the mind of one creature you can see within range, damaging its pysche and altering its behaviour. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be infused by dissonant thoughts. Roll a {@dice 1d6}. It gains one of the following negative effects.

items: (1)The target takes the Attack action and targets the nearest creature it can see within range of the attack at random. It moves towards the target if it's a melee attack and can reach the target.
(2)The target screams loudly and raises its arms (if they have any). It has disadvantage on attack rolls and Dexterity saving throws.
(3)The target drops to the ground and acts normally on its turn but must remain {@condition prone}
(5)The target starts laughing uncontrollably and loses the ability to speak normally.
(6)The dissonant thoughts are extremely intense. The target takes another {@damage 1d12} of psychic damage and is {@condition incapacitated}.

entries: At the end of each of its turns, it takes {@damage 1d12} psychic damage, and it can then make another Wisdom saving throw. On a success, the spell ends on the target.

spell.name: Coin Toss
entries: Whenever you see a creature within range attempting an attack or a saving throw, you can let fate decide. Toss a coin (or roll a {@dice 1d2}). On heads (or a 1) it adds +2 to the roll and on tails (or a 2) it adds -2.
A creature is not a valid target of this spell if it's already being targetted by this spell.

spell.name: Madness Spike
entries: Choose a creature within range. The creature gets imbued with psychic energy attacking it through the nervous system. The creature must succed a Wisdom saving throw or take {@damage 2d10} psychic damage. Roll a {@dice 1d8}. On a roll of 8, the target is also {@condition incapacitated} until the end of its next turn. This cantrip does not affect non-intelligent constructs or undead.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Asylum (WIP PSYC TERR)
entries: Cube, psychic damage increase. Sav throws for {@condition frightened}. Sav throw per turn and failed, spends reaction. Creatures with Int lower than X immune.
Aqua ring, Geyser, Muddy water, Steam Eruption, Water Sport
Ghost, Destiny bond, Shadow ball, shadow claw, shadow force, shadow sneak, Curse
Draco meteor (Cant move after), Roar of time, Spacial Rend
Acid armor, Baneful Bunker(reaction), toxic spikes, venoshock, toxic thread, sludge bomb, sludge wave

spell.name: Paranoia
entries: You imbue a creature within a state of paranoia. This creature must succeed on an Intelligence saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of every creature they see within 30 feet of them.

While {@condition frightened} by this spell, the creature must take the Attack action and make a range attack against the closest creature it is {@condition frightened} by, provided they are within range and can make such attack.
A creature repeats the saving throw again at the end of their turn. On a success, the spell ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, you can target an additional creature for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Encore(WIP)
entries: User repeats action,against same targets(even corpses), on same point, etc. it last did. End of each turn, makes Wisdom saving throw
If it can't wastes action doing nothing

spell.name: Confusing Grasp (WIP)
entries: Make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the target takes {@damage 2d4} psychic damage and must take the Attack action and attack the closest creature within his reach. If no creature is within reach, it targets itself instead.

spell.name: Cards of X (WIP)
entries: You conjure a set of cards that can either be Blue, red, purple or black. On black, double cards.

spell.name: Pain Split (WIP)
entries: Armor-like effect. Whenever an enemy hits with a melee attack, spen dice.

When hit by a melee attack, you can spend your reaction and roll {@dice 2d6}. You must cast this spell before seeing the damage roll. You then substract this roll to the damage roll and you deal this amount of damage to the attacking creature.

spell.name: Dream Weaver (WIP)
entries: You get into the mind of a sleeping intelligent creature.

spell.name: Mental reclusion (WIP)
entries: You incapacitate intelligent creature. You fill the mind of the creature with macabre and horrendous images. At the start of turn they repeat saving throw. On a fail, they try to stop the viewing by scratching their eyes. They take {@dice 2d4} and become {@condition blinded} until the start of their next turn. A creature that spends 5 rounds or more under this condition is permanently {@condition blinded}.
You must spend your action to keep the effect.

spell.name: Nervous Touch
entries: You touch a living creature and unleash psychic energy from your hand that travels through the nervous system of the creature.
Make a melee spell attack. On a hit, the creature takes {@damage 1d6} and substracts {@dice 1d4} from its next attack roll.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach certain levels: 5th level ({@dice 2d6}), 11th level ({@dice 3d6}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d6}).
